summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It includes count sheets, inmate rosters, and official out-count forms detailing inmate populations, assignments, and movements within the facility on that date. The records show Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) under an 'ATTY' (attorney visit) assignment.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Movements
events.description: Administrative records document the inmate population count, assignments, and out-counts (inmates temporarily outside their housing units) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 9, 2019, with registration number 76318-054.
Epstein's housing assignment was Z04-206LAD, which indicates he was in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
On this date, Epstein was listed under an 'ATTY' (attorney visit) assignment category, suggesting he had a scheduled legal visit.
The documents are routine prison administrative records showing inmate counts, rosters, and movements, providing a snapshot of the facility's population on a specific day.
The total inmate census recorded in one count was 755, with 13 inmates listed on an out-count form as being temporarily outside their housing units.
